title: Language Survey
body: About $$42.3\%$$ of Californians and $$19.6\%$$ of all Americans over age five speak a language other than English at home. Using your class as the sample, conduct a hypothesis test to determine if the percent of the students at your school who speak a language other than English at home is different from $$42.3\%$$.
lesson: 9.6 Hypothesis Testing of a Single Mean and Single Proportion
